text1: MLB : Houston 8 , Pittsburgh 6 . Carlos Beltran went two for four with a homer and scored three times Friday night as Houston downed Pittsburgh , 8 - 6 . Craig Biggio , Jose Vizcaino and Jeff Bagwell also homered for

Ky . Company Wins Grant to Study Peptides ( AP ) . AP - A company founded by a chemistry researcher at the University of Louisville won a grant to develop a method of producing better peptides , which are short chains of amino acids , the building blocks of proteins .
